title: Ensono Stacks Rest Client Client Endpoint Generator
description: The @ensono-stacks/rest-client:client-endpoint generator will add an endpoint to an existing project

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

httpClient.description: The import path of the previously generated http-client used in the application
httpClient.x-prompt: What is the import path of your previously generated http-client library? [e.g. @projectName/http-client]

envVar.description: The name of the API url environment variable
envVar.x-prompt: What is the environment variable for the API URL?

endpointVersion.x-prompt: What is the version of your current endpoint?

methods.description: List of HTTP methods to be generated. Choose from get, post, patch, put, delete, head, options.

directory.description: Subdirectory inside libs/ where the generated library placed.
directory.x-prompt: Where in libs/ directory do you want to generate this endpoint?

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting)
